descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...yellow and red
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...red and green
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...some yellow and whole black

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... Single and distinct colored squares across the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...increase  factor in the width and height for each distinct row or column that is occupies a square.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...For each single square, 15 more squares will appear around the original to form a 4x4 square shape of the same color.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Multiple colors on the black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...Multiply by four.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...fill the same color by 4x4 grid size.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Multiple colors on the black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...Multiply by four.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...fill the same color by 4x4 grid size.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Single and distinct colored squares across the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...double that of the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...keep the squares in there same location based on the lower left corner. double there size, keep same color.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Single and distinct colored squares across the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...double that of the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...keep the squares in there same location based on the lower left corner. double there size, keep same color.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...5 colors squares on the grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...5 colors multiple by 4 times.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...single colored squares throughout the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...doubles in size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...for each color square you change them to a 4x4 block of that color.  You will remove black squares in between them so that when you have the 4x4 colors, the colors will be touching.  The colors should also start by touching the outside of the grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see....colored dots on a black background.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should change from a 10x10 to a 20x20
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...fill a 4x4 square in the top left corner with green, a 4x4 square to the right of the green square, a 4x8 rectangle in the bottom left corner with blue and a 4x4 square in the bottom right corner with yellow.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...different colored single pixels across the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...The grid should double to be 20x20
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replace red pixels with a red block of 4x4 pixels from bottom right to top left, yellow pixel with a yellow block of 4x4 pixels from bottom right to top left, blue pixel with a blue block of 4x4 pixels from bottom right to top left, green pixel with a green block of 4x4 pixels from bottom right to top left. Always replace a pixel with a block of 4X4 of the same color starting from the   original pixel to the left and up.
